title: Rocket pesto with peas and tomatoes

ingredients.item: 3 tbsp grated essential Waitrose parmigiano reggiano
Â½ lemon, grated zest and juice

instructions.step: Cook the spaghetti in a pan of boiling water, according to packet instructions, adding the peas to the pan 3 minutes before the end.  Meanwhile, blitz together the rocket, parmigiano reggiano, olive oil and lemon zest and juice in a food processor, until finely chopped and combined.  Drain the pasta, then stir through the pesto mixture and tomatoes. Serve with extra grated parmigiano reggiano if liked.
